markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Daylight Vapor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=826)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #160: Assault on Hunting Lodge Seven](/Sources.aspx?ID=49) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This heavier-than-air mist emits a soft glow. While this poison lasts, it causes its victims to shine from within with agonizing, brilliant radiance. This effect has the [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) trait (although the poison itself doesn't, so only the light effect can be [counteracted](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) by [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) effects). The [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition from _daylight vapor_ can't be removed while the poison lasts, and when the victim enters an area of magical darkness, the poison attempts to counteract the darkness with a counteract modifier of +21. If the poison fails, it can't attempt to counteract the same darkness again. 

**Saving Throw** DC 31 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 poison damage and sickened 1 (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 poison damage and sickened 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 10d6 damage and sickened 3 (1 round)

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_sunburst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=326).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Daylight Vapor
